INTERFACE_IP_PREFIX_EMPTY_STRING.desc: Configure empty string as ip-prefix in INTERFACE table.

INTERFACE_IPPREFIX_PORT_MUST_CONDITION_F.desc: Interface Ip-prefix port-name must condition failure.

INTERFACE_IPPREFIX_PORT_MUST_CONDITION_T.desc: Interface Ip-prefix port-name must condition pass.

INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure wrong value for nat zone.
INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.eStr: Invalid nat zone for the interface.

INTERFACE_VALID_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure valid value for nat zone.

INTERFACE_INVALID_LOOPBACK_ACTION.desc: INCORRECT LOOPBACK ACTION IN INTERFACE TABLE.

INTERFACE_INVALID_ENABLE_IPV6_LINK_LOCAL.desc: Enable the ipv6 link-local as true.

INTERFACE_VALID_VNET_NAME.desc: Configure valid VNET name for an interface.

INTERFACE_INVALID_VNET_NAME.desc: Configure non-existent VNET name for an interface.

INTERFACE_UPPER_MAC_ADDR.desc: Set UPPERCASE administrator-provided interface mac address.
